description.narrative: Syftet med denna Trust Fund är att erbjuda flexibel finansiering för små innovativa och strategiska insatser inom god samhällsstyrning i enlighet med AfDB's Governance Strategy, dvs med fokus på transparens och ansvarsutkrävande inom offentlig finansiell styrning och ekonomisk samhällstyrning.

The purpose of the GTF is to provide financing to support the implementation of the AfDB's Governance Strategy. The GTF provides untied grants to support innovative ideas to promote good economic and financial governance, transparency and accountability in the use of public funds for the benefit of member countries through consulting services and technical assistance.

The purpose of the Governance Trust Fund is to assist the Bank’s Regional MemberCountries (RMCs) to build capable and responsive States by strengthening transparency and accountability in the management of public resources. Specifically, the GTF will support innovative ideas in the field of economic and financial governance that demonstrate potential to promote change and achieve results within the context of the Governance Action Plan(GAP).
